summary: The faith of a caring physician and an unquestioningly religious youth is shaken to the core when the pair is inexplicably brought together.
cast: Élise Guilbault|Patrick Drolet|Marie-Josée Bastien|Claude Binet|Luc Bourgeois|Lise Castonguay|Richard Champagne|Pierre Collin|Benoît Dagenais|Stéphane Demers|Raoul Desmeules|Muriel Dutil|Denise Gagnon|Amélie Grenier|Éveline Gélinas|Paul Hébert|Bonfield Marcoux|Guillaume Meloche|Isabelle Pastena|Micheline Poitras|Lyne Riel|Isabelle Roy|Paul Savoie|Michelle Sirois|Jean-François Sénécal|Diane Verreault|Ghislaine Vincent
keywords: sainte anne de beaupre quebec|silence|crisis of faith|friendship|healthcare
title: La neuvaine
